art.author: toni
art.post: When I was at my lowest, and felt that I was going “mad” I was visited by Jesus.  At the time I did not know if it was my spirit guide, or Jesus until I saw this portrait.  This is in fact the man that came to me in my hour of need.  I was telling myself how alone I was, and he told me I was never alone.  He gave me the strength to lift myself out of the pit I was mentally in.  I am so grateful to have watched “Katie” (which I have never done before), and seen the boy and the artist of this portrait.  This IS the man I saw!
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
